allow:
Bash(python manage.py shell -c "
from pharmacy.models import ActiveStoreInventory
print(''Active Store Inventory (Top 10):'')
print(''-'' * 70)
inventories = ActiveStoreInventory.objects.select_related(''medication'', ''active_store'').order_by(''-stock_quantity'')[:10]
for inv in inventories:
    print(f''{inv.medication.name:30} | {inv.active_store.dispensary.name:20} | Stock: {inv.stock_quantity:5} | Batch: {inv.batch_number}'')
")

Bash(python manage.py shell -c "
from pharmacy.models import ActiveStoreInventory
print(''Recently Delivered Items in Active Store:'')
print(''-'' * 70)
# Check for the specific items we delivered
items = [''Adhesive Tape'', ''Diclofenac'', ''Paracetamol'']
for item_name in items:
    try:
        from pharmacy.models import Medication
        med = Medication.objects.get(name__icontains=item_name)
        invs = ActiveStoreInventory.objects.filter(medication=med).select_related(''active_store'', ''medication'')
        for inv in invs:
            print(f''{inv.medication.name:30} | {inv.active_store.dispensary.name:20} | Stock: {inv.stock_quantity:5} | Batch: {inv.batch_number}'')
    except Exception as e:
        print(f''Error checking {item_name}: {e}'')
")
